column5: Just steps from Crestview Station (light rail to downtown) and the 801 Metro Rapid bus line. Walking distance to cool local grocery stores and eateries. (Maximum) two-person fully furnished guest unit in owner-occupied property with queen-sized bed, full bath, mini-kitchen including coffee maker, and cable TV/WiFi. Upstairs unit with private entrance and one off-street parking space. Access to laundry on property.
